sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>Creates mappings between Category(Time Card) and Operational work type(Operational Resource Plan) in Time Card Category Map table. Update state of property 'com.snc.project.date_change_cascade_persist_resource_plan_state' from true to false for upgrade customers.</description> <name>RM Paris Upgrade</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[var rmParisUpgradeHelper = new RMParisUpgradeHelper(); rmParisUpgradeHelper.run();]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-03-19 09:57:20</sys_created_on> <sys_id>b5b49bcfc7630010bce463c703c260f2</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>RM Paris Upgrade</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Resource Management" source="com.snc.resource_management">7200da2b47e64210cd4e1ce4316d438e</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_b5b49bcfc7630010bce463c703c260f2</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-04-24 05:21:05</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
